Instance.description: Information about a group of tutorial tips.

TunableEnum.name: group_requirement
TunableEnum.description: The requirement for completing this tip group. ANY means any of the tips in this group need to be completed for the group to be considered complete. ALL means all of the tips in this group need to be completed for the group to be considered complete.

TunableList.name: tips
TunableList.description: The tips that are associated with this tip group.
